test_masc.py¶

A reader for corpora that consist of documents in the ISO GrAF format.

All the test use the MASC version 1.0.3

class test_masc.TestMascCorpusReader[source]¶

This class contain the test methods if the class masc.py.

Methods

test_nouns()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of nouns from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of nouns.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of nouns.
test_paras()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of paragraphs from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of paragraphs, each encoded as a list of sentences, which are in turn encoded as lists of word strings.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of strings.
test_persons()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of persons from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of persons.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of persons.
test_raw()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve the file.

Return given file(s) as a single string.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve a string.
test_sents()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of sentences from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of sentences or utterances, each encoded as a list of word strings.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of sentences.
test_verbs()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of verbs from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of verbs.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of verbs.
test_words()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve a list of strings from a given file.

Return the given file(s) as a list of words and punctuation symbols.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve the list of string.
